item.title: Peristyle garden in house of Messius Ampliatus (II.ii.4)
item.description: Province Italia Location Pompeii Pompeii (Pleiades) Sublocation Region II House House of Messius Ampliatus(II.ii.4)) Garden Peristyle garden in house of Messius Ampliatus (II.ii.4) Keywords insulae courtyards Garden Description A. The portico which bordered the peristyle garden (a) on the north and east side was accessed from the entrance hall. This site had been extensively damaged prior to excavation.
